title: PvP.Net Patch Kernel (game will not launch)
body: I have downloaded the hextech repair tool have done every step and I can only get the game to run 50% of the time. When I do get it to work it is by resetting my "winsock" and then running the game as admin. I have made sure my my firewall allows league in. When I try to run the game as non admin PVP . Net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. This happens even after multiple times of re downloading the game and re-patching. Have very limited knowledge of computer things beyond the basics. Would really love some help.

replies.body: This error is usually the result of a setting with your OS or something else that's blocking the game from launching.  I know that you've taken some steps already to troubleshoot this, and I recommend going over each step in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if you still have any issues after performing those steps.
I did all of those things and the same problem came up.

http://imgur.com/8JUr3BU here is a link to what pops up when I do not run it in admin when I do run it in admin however I just continuously get the bug where you can press launch but the login screen will not come up

Thanks for the screenshot and follow-up!  If the guide wasn't able to get this fixed, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you and help find out what's going on.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
thank you I sent in the request sorry I couldn't respond in a more timely manner have been working.
